publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1667# Sandra White: Congratulations to Glaswegian Newspaperâ€”That the Parliament congratulates The Glaswegian newspaper for its campaign against post office closures and in particular its involvement of the public and Glasgow City Council and sincerely hopes that all interested parties will work together to stop the further erosion of post office services in Glasgow and Scotland. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn*, Bashir Ahmad*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Brian Adam*, Bob Doris*
S3M-1667# Congratulations to Glaswegian Newspaper (lodged on 1 April 2008) Gil Paterson*
